name: Hangman Forever
description:
H o w    t o    p l a y

Each round presents you with a classic Hangman Puzzle. Your goal is to guess the underlying word or phrase, one letter at a time! Each turn you have four options.

S p i n

You'll spin a spinner and guess a consonant. You'll get the number of points the spinner landed on per each of the guessed consonant in the puzzle. Warning! The spinner gets more dangerous with each correct guess!

V o w e l

If you have the points to spare, you can purchase a vowel. You get no points for guessing a vowel correctly.

S o l v e

If you think you've solved the puzzle, announce the answer for a reward proportional to the remaining number of letters.

P a s s

If you're too scared to risk a bad spin, can't afford a vowel, and don't have the solution for the solve, you can always just pass your turn.

There's also other fun stuff like bonuses that award you under special conditions like multiplying the reward for solving the puzzle!

M o d s

What makes this "Hangman Forever" and not "Hangman Until You Run Out Of Puzzles" is mod support! You can import existing or create your own set of Hangman Forever puzzles!

Create custom puzzles for your favorite fandom, make in-joke puzzles for your friend group, or contribute to the Base Game (which is itself a mod!), the sky is the limit!
